Texts.Chs: 在^orange;军械制作台^reset;处制造^orange;灯笼杆^reset;并回到^green;韦尔奇^reset;处。
Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Lantern Stick^reset; at the ^orange;Armoy^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 现在，您无需用手电就,将它顶在头上就能旅行！另外，我在存储中发现了一些^orange;玻璃^reset;。 为什么不带上呢？
Texts.Eng: Now you'll be able to slap that on your head and travel without needing to hold a flashlight! Also, I found some ^orange;Glass^reset; in storage. Why don't you take it?

Texts.Chs: 有时，黑暗会成为可怕的阻碍。那就是我得到的^orange;油^reset;的目的：您可以在^orange;军械制作台^reset;处制作^orange;灯笼杆^reset;，看清黑暗中的一切。研究^orange;武器护甲^reset;以学习制作方方法。
Texts.Eng: Sometimes, the darkness can prove a horrible hindrance. That's where tha ^orange;Oil^reset; I got ya ter make comes in: You can craft a ^orange;Lantern Stick^reset; to see in the dark at an ^orange;Armory^reset;. ^green;Research^reset; into ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset; to learn how.
